QuestData.Title: Friend to the Forgelite
QuestData.Description:
With Phaestus in hand, we can start building Crest.
Let us return to Elysian Hold. Triumphant!
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Polemarch Adrestes in Elysian Hold.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Polemarch Adrestes in Elysian Hold.
